revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Sea Spirit's Den |image = [[File:Sea Spirit's Den.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Sea Spirit's Den. |tokens = 725,000 |location = East of Azure Bay. }} '''Sea Spirit's Den''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 7,543,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Lapras.png|40px]] Lapras || rowspan=6 colspan=3| <center> N/A |- | [[File:Dwebble.png|40px]] Dwebble |- | [[File:Lanturn.png|40px]] Lanturn |- | [[File:Binacle.png|40px]] Binacle |- | [[File:Woobat.png|40px]] Woobat |- | [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |}

<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Lugia.png|40px]] Lugia || <center> 92,375,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |}
